name: "Craftsman Door Chime"
description: Use the Wired Door Chime in a new wired doorbell installation or to replace an existing chime that is either outdated or does not work anymore. Its white Arts and Crafts inspired design works with most indoor decor, and can be mounted horizontally or vertically to offer flexibility in placement options. It features 3 selectable tunes and volume control. Includes a 1-year limited warranty.Use in new installations or to replace an outdated or unusable chimeUse with any wired push buttonMade of durable, white plasticRequires a 16 VAC transformer85 dB volumes allows the chime to be heard throughout the homeChoose 8-note Westminster or 2-note "ding-dong" tune for front door, 1-note "ding" tune for rear doorArts and crafts design works with most dcorWire to existing or new system - replacing a chime takes less than 30 minutesAdjustable volume controlHome Depot Protection Plan:
